item.title: Introduction
item.description: Hi! My name is Daniel and this is my portfolio. I’m a software engineer and Unity developer and I’ve been working in the games industry since I finished my education.

item.title: Journey Match 3D
item.description: Platform - Web Engine - Unity 2022 Responsibilities - Main contributor. Code architecture, gameplay, UI, content management, interactions, communication with Nakama servers, game configurations.
